## NFTCollection.getTransactions() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Get the all transactions for this program

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTransactions(options?: SignaturesForAddressOptions): Promise<TransactionResponse[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                        | Description       |
| --------- | --------------------------- | ----------------- |
| options   | SignaturesForAddressOptions | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;TransactionResponse\[\]&gt;
